content:
alexcrichton opened PR #10079 from alexcrichton:windows-maybe-faster-build to bytecodealliance:main:

I read somewhere on the internet that C:\ may be slow for I/O. Let's try moving the Rust target directory to somewhere else and see if it has any affect on performance

prtest:full

alexcrichton commented on PR #10079:

I'm not seeing a significant change, so closing.
